== Optional exercise: Implementing a tree to view the todos grouped by tags
=== Target of this exercise
In this exercise you create a part with displays a tree with the todo items structured by there tags.
=== Add dependencies
Ensure that `org.eclipse.jface` and `org.eclipse.e4.ui.dialogs` plug-in are available as dependency in the `com.example.e4.rcp.todo` plug-in. You might have added these dependencies already in another exercise.
=== Create part implementation
Create the following part implementation with the `label` or `summary` and `description` fields as tree columns. This part should also have a "Load Data" button to load the data into the viewer.
You can use the following example code as base for this exercise.
[source,java] ---- include::res/viewer/TagOverviewPart.java[] ----
The result should look similar to the following screenshot.
image::filteredtree_tutorial.png[Result Part after the implementation of the JFace Table]
TIP: The "Load Data" button is later used, once you implement the possibility to delete data.
